item.title: Consumer sentiment drops sharply in February as inflation worries soar

item.title: Frontier Air’s stock rallies as its rosier outlook, new routes wow Wall Street
item.description: Frontier plans an expansion to cities such as Reno, Nev.; and Tuscan, Ariz.

item.title: Expedia’s stock rallies as Wall Street cheers the return of its dividend
item.description: For the first time since the COVID-19 pandemic, Expedia will pay out a quarterly dividend of 40 cents a share.

item.title: Worried about Elon Musk and ‘DOGE’ getting your Social Security number? Here’s how to protect yourself.
item.description: If the wrong person gained access to personal financial information held by the U.S. Treasury, it would constitute the biggest data breach in history.
